title: nijamunnai
sahitya:
nijamunnai nambinEn nIlaayatAkSi


anupallavi

  gajamukhanoD-arumukhanait-tanda unak-kenraniDam
  karuNai illAdadenna kAraNamO nAraNiyE


caraNam    kAmam enum pEi piDittuk-kalanguden manakkurangu yamaninum
  koDiyapala nOi koNDavenak-kirangat-tAmadam udavAdu tALa
  muDiyAdamba rAmadAsan paNiyum rAjarAjEshvari
